### How to view the worksheet answers

The worksheet answers are hidden in the Google Doc style Heading 4.
Follow these instructions to view the answers.

1. Make a copy of the worksheet and save to your Google Drive.

1. Select some answer text.

1. Change the text color.

1. While the text is selected, change the color for Heading 4 by
   selecting `Update 'Heading 4' to match`.

Now the answers are visible!
